preview.html: A dream about suhoor for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether he prepares the suhoor meal for Ramadan fasting or not, according to Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Another interpretation of a dream about suhoor in a dream. Suhoor is one of the meals for which the blessed month of Ramadan and fasting in general are famous. We may feel regret if we sleep and miss the time for suhoor and food. Interpretation of suhoor in a dream: Suhoor in a dream shows the machinations of enemies and that it is repentance for the sinner, guidance for the infidel, and a little or little sustenance for the dreamer. Whoever stays up late with the intention of fasting, or has suhoor as a regular meal, or without intending to fast while he is asleep. Whoever intends to fast with suhoor, if it is during a time other than Ramadan, then this is better for him, or repentance, or money he acquires or raises. And if it is during Ramadan, then it is better. Abundance, lawful money, immediate comfort, happiness, strength of spirit, victory over enemies and machinations. Whoever is tempted by little is good for him, and the suhoor of dates, bread and milk is good and healing, and the suhoor of meat and fatty foods is money. Suhoor of many different dishes indicates a breakthrough in the situation and progress in something. A person strives for it, and suhoor from what is not eaten is a warning and warning so that he does not fall into a sin, or from what he did, or from an injustice he committed. Suhoor is all a blessing in livelihood, money, and children. And suhoor at a different time or day, it is an invalid act, and the fortuneteller must repent or correct what he did. His action; Because it is a great injustice. Interpretation of missing suhoor in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about missing suhoor in a dream. Some ancient interpreters, such as Al-Nabulsi, interpreted suhoor in a dream as abundant sustenance and repentance for the sinner or a sign of the machinations of enemies. For Ramadan or not, and the intention to fast. Missing suhoor in a dream is evidence of the goodness and blessing that the dreamer has lost from himself as a result of his preoccupation with the world, play and fun and forgetting his afterlife. However, if the intention is different, or you eat suhoor as a regular meal or on an unspecified date, then this dream is evidence of your following whims and falsehood. And forgetting the path of truth. In addition, wasting time for suhoor indicates a large number of sins and disobedience, and that the dreamer lives in negligence, forgetting the path of God and not caring about it. Interpretation of suhoor in a dream by Ibn Sirini Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin believes that seeing suhoor is a return to God, far from The path of sins and disobedience, adhering to the path of truth, abandoning desires and pleasures, seeking the face of God, monotheism of God, and seeing an infidel to see suhoor. It is monotheism in God. He also says that he saw in a dream that he was eating the suhoor meal during the day, that is, outside of its proper time, as evidence that the dreamer is doing something immoral and false and that he should stay away from it. He must repent sincerely and return to God and seek forgiveness from God. But if the fortuneteller wrongs a person and that is a great injustice, then he must return the right to his rightful owners and repent for every forbidden act he does. The following is the general interpretation of a dream about suhoor in a dream, about a person performing suhoor with the intention of fasting, or performing suhoor. As a regular meal or without the intention of fasting while he sleeps. – Suhoor is all a blessing for livelihood, money, and children. Others said: guidance, repentance, a return to reason and righteousness, or a decision to make.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing torture in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about torture by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing torture in a dream indicates the distress and difficulties that the dreamer is suffering from. Whoever sees in a dream the torture of others, this indicates cruelty, injustice, and deception. Seeing torture in a dream has another positive aspect because it can indicate adventure, ambition, and love. Whoever sees this in a dream, torturing himself by stripping his skin, this indicates marriage to a righteous woman. Whoever sees in a dream that he is shedding his skin, this is a sign of death. Whoever sees in a dream that he is dissecting his body, this dream indicates a lack of money. Whoever sees in a dream that he is using a saw and stretching his body This is evidence that God will bless him with a male child. Interpretation of seeing torture in a woman’s dream: A woman who sees torture in a dream shows her bad psychological state. Seeing an unmarried woman being tortured in a dream may be a sign of separation from her lover. A married woman who sees torture in a dream, This indicates the ill-treatment with which her husband treats her. And the woman. For a pregnant woman who sees torture in a dream, this indicates the extent of pain and fatigue that she is experiencing during pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of a vision of torture for the dead. Whoever dreams of a dead person being tortured with fire, this dream indicates a bad end. And whoever sees the dead He is being tortured by anything other than fire, so this dream indicates the torment of the grave. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased is being tortured, this may be a message to the dreamer about the necessity of giving charity to the deceased. Interpretation of seeing a prisoner being tortured: Whoever dreams of being imprisoned and tortured, this indicates that he will fall into trouble and trouble. And seeing a prisoner being tortured indicates A great trial will happen to the pioneer. Whoever sees that he is being tortured with fire in prison, this indicates repentance for sins. And torturing him by beating him, this indicates failure and oppression in his life. Interpretation of seeing children being tortured in a dream. Anyone who dreams of a child suffering in a dream indicates failure in the field of study. Or failure in a romantic relationship. There are those who interpret seeing children being tortured in a dream as indicating repentance for sins and disobedience. Whoever sees in a dream a child being tortured and hearing his screams in the dream, this indicates the losses absorbed by a drink under his management. Seeing children being tortured in a dream may be... The dream is the extent of the need to get married and have children. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing torture in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pilgrims in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of seeing pilgrims in a dream. Below we will learn about many interpretations received by interpretation scholars regarding the interpretation of a dream of seeing pilgrims in a dream and others. Interpretation of a dream of seeing pilgrims in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of seeing pilgrims in a dream can be a sign of tolerance and tolerance, and where if a married man is seen The pilgrims respond, as this may indicate tolerance, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a young man is seen leaving the pilgrims, this may mean forgiveness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about saying goodbye to colleagues in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about saying goodbye to colleagues in a dream can lead to a promotion. It may also indicate Promotion at work, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a married man saying goodbye to his colleagues can lead to a promotion, God willing. If the dreamer sees someone he hates and says goodbye to him, this may mean the end of hostility, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my daughter saying goodbye to me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my daughter saying goodbye to me in a dream. Saying goodbye to children can indicate independence from the family, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees saying goodbye to the children, it can lead to a trip, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees saying goodbye to his daughter in a dream, it may be evidence of her marriage, and God Almighty is over everything. When a married woman sees She bids farewell to her daughter, and this may lead to her marriage or her departure, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband saying goodbye to me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-husband saying goodbye to me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that, but seeing farewell can lead to absence or separation, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees Goodbye, this may indicate the end of the partnership, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees goodbye in a dream, it could be an indication of travel, separation, or marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about saying goodbye to a brother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about saying goodbye to a brother in a dream, it could be an indication of the brother’s marriage, and God I know the unseen. If a married woman sees farewell to a brother in a dream, this may indicate his marriage, God willing. If a married man sees farewell to a brother in a dream, this may be evidence of travel, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees farewell to a brother in a dream, it may be That is evidence of his journey or marriage, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about saying goodbye before death in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about saying goodbye before death in a dream saying goodbye in a dream can indicate separation, and God knows the unseen. Because seeing farewell can indicate separation or rivalry, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married man, you may Farewell leads to separation or travel, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees a farewell, this may indicate separation or travel, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of my beloved saying goodbye to me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of my beloved saying goodbye to me in a dream. Perhaps saying goodbye to someone you love expresses an apology and a request for forgiveness, and God Top and Know When a dreamer sees someone you love saying goodbye to you, this may indicate that he is bidding farewell to a stage in his life, and God knows best. Farewell to your loved one can also express

title: Interpretation of a dream about the name Tahani in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you, dear reader, through the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of the Name Tahani in a Dream. The dreamer often sees a name during his sleep, whether it is male or female, and the name may be linked to a person whom the sleeper already knows. In life, he or she does not deal with anyone with this name, which is surprising and confusing for him because he sees a name that he has never dealt with anyone before. The world of dreams is vast, and delving into it is not an easy task. Therefore, dream interpretation scholars such as Imam Muhammad bin Shirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq made a lot of effort. We try to come up with an interpretation of everything that one can have in his dream, and to put evidence about it with the help of the Book of God Almighty and the Sunnah of His Noble Messenger, and through what the scholars of interpretation have reached, we present the results. From seeing the name Tahani in a dream. Interpretation of the name Tahani in a dream. Explain the meaning of the name Tahani, which is the plural of the word (congratulations), which is the singular form for females and goes back to the Arabic origin. It refers to what people do when happy occasions come, exchanging blessings and participating in expressing happiness and joy, and interpreting its vision as follows: It indicates the end of distress and hearing good news. Seeing it in a dream means that the dreamer’s condition will change to happiness and joy after distress and sadness. It symbolizes accepting the supplications that the dreamer has been praying for a long time and hopes that God Almighty will accept them. Interpretation of seeing the name Tahani in one dream: An unmarried woman may see it in her dream and will not be able to interpret it. Therefore, we explain in the following points the consequences of seeing it in a dream: Seeing it is one of the praiseworthy things that heralds her happiness and fulfills her desires, and if she is looking for work, she will soon find a prestigious job from which she will make the profit she wants. It indicates the progress of a good young man who has a generous and easy attitude towards his engagement. And what will you bring to the wedding. The interpretation of the appearance of the name Tahani in a dream for a married woman may be the news of the imminent pregnancy of a female child. In a dream, a married woman shows the extent of marital happiness and family stability. It indicates her husband’s success in work, and if he works in trade, this is good news about The success of his work and obtaining abundant profit gives them a happy and full life. Interpretation of Names in a Dream The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that when one sees a name in a dream, it has an interpretation and influence on the life of the dreamer, and through the meaning of the name an interpretation of his vision can be given. He is careful in the matters of his life. Seeing the names attributed to God Almighty in a dream indicates God Almighty’s satisfaction with the dreamer and the extent of the kindness of His creation and that He will support him and raise his status. The name Tahani in a man’s dream, if he is a merchant, also indicates success and expansion in trade, and if not If he is married, he will soon marry a fair girl who will bring happiness and joy to his life. To interpret another dream, you can access the instant dream interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of seeing oatmeal in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing oatmeal in a dream in detail: Seeing oatmeal in a dream is a strong indication that a person will obtain a lot of money, as seeing oatmeal in a dream is one of the things that indicates that it is one of the foods that indicate goodness, nutrition, and blessing. Moreover, This vision shows the abundant goodness that the deity will receive, making him feel the beauty of the atmosphere in a person’s happiness. Through our article today, you will know all the consequences of seeing oatmeal in a dream. Follow us. See also: Piano in a dream. Interpretation of seeing oatmeal in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing oatmeal in a dream in detail. Oatmeal is one of the grains that resembles rice in shape, as it looks similar in their interpretation of the dream, as oats are considered one of the signs that dream interpretation scholars unanimously agree upon as meaning. For kindness, nourishment, and relief from all worries and greatness. Among the most important interpretations of seeing oatmeal in a dream are the following: Seeing oatmeal in a dream means goodness, blessing, and livelihood for the person who has the vision, and it is one of the good and desirable visions for all groups of people. Also, seeing oatmeal preparations in a dream is a sign of accepting a happy period full of joy and contentment. For the dreamer: If you see spoiled and unfit groats in a dream, this means that you will be exposed to many problems, as well as crises for a period of time, or the dreamer’s poor psychological state, and God knows best. Also, seeing oatmeal that has been cooked in a dream means that you hear all the news that It satisfies the heart and makes it happy. Seeing oatmeal in a dream is a sign of a happy and beautiful life, and it also indicates justice and blessing for the pioneer. Seeing oatmeal in a dream is a strong indicator of getting rid of stress and distress, improving conditions for the better and thus enjoying God’s gifts. In the event that he sees The dreamer eats oatmeal, this means that he overcame all the difficulties, challenges, and competition to reach the goal he wanted to achieve, and God knows best. So, seeing oatmeal in a dream is a strong indicator of goodness and multiple nourishment, whether in money, health, or otherwise. Read also: Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dreamInterpretation of seeing oatmeal in a dream for a single womanSeeing oatmeal for a single girl is a sign that you have entered the stage of happiness and that the period is filled with all things useful to the lifter. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees that she is buying oatmeal in a dream, this vision indicates improvement That girl’s financial situation and her halal income, which she is happy with, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl buys black beans, this is evidence that she will receive an inheritance and it could be great wealth. But buying white oatmeal is one of the signs that indicate the girl’s prosperity and goodness. Seeing groats Buying it for single people in a dream is a sign of a close relationship with a person who has noble, good and fair morals. Read also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dreamInterpretation of seeing oatmeal in a dream for a married womanSeeing oatmeal for a married woman

Seeing and buying grits for singles in a dream is a sign of a close relationship with a person who has noble, good and just morals. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eating fish in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating fish in a dream for a single woman Seeing eating fish in a dream for unmarried women has nice connotations and many benefits, especially if the fish is free of bad taste and tastes delicious. Scholars and commentators have come together to clarify these concepts in something detailed so that we can understand them all. Interpretation of a dream about eating fish in a dream for a single woman What is the interpretation of a dream about eating fish for a single woman? Eating fish in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates promising and happy meanings, as the dream is an interpretation of the abundance of nutrition for her in life. It is also an indication that it will be of great benefit, especially if this fish is large in size. If the fish is brown, this indicates her marriage and a life full of contentment and tranquility with her partner. Perhaps the vision expresses her close commitment and her life full of love and contentment, so if she catches a fish in her dream, this is clear evidence that her wedding date is planned and that her stable life with her husband is happy. We also find that her vision shows the good qualities of the other half, and does not neglect his prayers no matter what happens, so she feels very comfortable with him. This dream portends the achievement of her ambitions and goals, so she did not imagine yesterday that it was a dream that she would find before her eyes today, so she thanks God Almighty for accepting her supplication and guiding her. She has the right and justice. If he tries to catch the fish in vain, this indicates that he is trying in the wrong way and that he must stay away from it before it is too late, as he will find nothing behind it but fatigue, worry and lack of livelihood. If the fish comes out of the sea alive in a dream, this means that God Almighty is pleased with her, so do not deny God's favor upon her and do good deeds until you find good and what comes after. If you cannot get a fish to eat, this indicates that she will try hard without getting what she wants, but she should not despair and try again and again until she succeeds in everything she thinks, because perseverance and optimism are the basis of her success and the limit of perfection. Seeing it in a dream is good news for the dreamer to get rid of any financial problem during this period, as her salary increases and she can pay her any amount, no matter how small it is. As for if the fish dies, this is a warning of the need to pay attention to the time she wastes on useless things, as she needs this time to achieve her dreams and goals, so she should not be lenient in this matter. Fresh fish also has great value, and in fact we find it with the same value in a dream because it shows the good behavior of the girl who is admired by the

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a dwarf in a dream

Interpretation of the dream of marrying a dwarf in a dream can It is a sign of a strong woman who controls her husband, and God knows the unseen. If a woman is seen marrying a dwarf, this may lead to the husband’s control, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees herself marrying a dwarf, this may lead to her marrying a man with low capabilities, and God knows best. He can also express He is in control, and God knows the unseen. When you see marriage to more than one wife, it can lead to blessings and goodness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a wedding, it can be a sign of stability, and God knows the unseen. When you see marriage to a Christian, this may indicate the achievement of goals, and God The highest and most knowledgeable interpretation of the dream of marrying someone you love in a dream is the highest interpretation

title: Crying over the grave of the dead in a dream

preview.html: Graves are a great symbol of death and are one of the places that introduce a kind of preaching of faith into people's hearts. With many interpretations and evidence of dreams, different opinions go to a vision that indicates caution and warning to humanity, and we will learn in detail about this evidence and dream interpretations from the translator of our website. Interpretation of seeing crying over the grave of the dead in a dream for a single, unmarried girl who sees in her dream That she visits the grave and cries over it without slapping, then this is good news for her soon to find comfort, marriage, and loss of worry. The unmarried girl who dreams that she visits the grave of a relative of hers and cries loudly with slaps and tears. Evidence that she is completely unstable in her life and is upset. The unmarried woman who Seeing a grave in her dream is one of the unpleasant dreams and visions. Because it indicates the presence of an obstacle in the girl’s life, who is psychologically unstable and sad. An unmarried woman who sees herself in a dream walking among the graves. This is a sign that she is wasting her time on things that mean nothing and she does not have Objectives. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is walking on graves is evidence that someone is stealing her money and money. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is crying on her father’s grave, this means that she lacks tenderness and affection. An unmarried woman who sees her mother crying and hugging her This indicates that she will earn a living and marry a man of status and power. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reburying the deceased. Interpretation of seeing crying on the grave of the dead in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees herself walking among the graves in a dream indicates that there are fears and problems in life. He mentioned Commentators say that this vision indicates that she is separated from her husband and cannot live with him. A married woman who sees herself digging a grave to bury her husband is evidence that her husband has left her. If a married woman sees that she is burying her husband, this indicates that she will not have children. Interpretation of seeing crying over the grave of a dead person in a dream About the man and its meaningIbn Sirin interprets the vision of crying in the grave as reprehensible, and crying, slapping and crying are interconnected. It indicates that the dreamer will receive unpleasant news. Seeing a person in a dream crying for someone he knows in reality and crying loudly over him. This indicates that he is receiving a lot of Sorrows and worries. The dreamer who sees that he is crying cries for acceptance. This indicates that he will receive more of God’s blessings if the crying is without a sound. And whoever sees this hits the grave and screams loudly. This indicates that she will give birth to a beautiful, good and healthy child. Seeing the ruler crying People walk behind him at his funeral and do not cry, for this ruler is just and righteous. If the man who heads the country sees himself dead and his funeral is followed by many people crying and crying in Ali’s voice, this means that the people wronged him and hated him. Read also: Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive Really, the meaning of seeing crying on the grave of a dead person in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation: A pregnant woman who sees herself accepting indicates that she will give birth easily and without difficulty.

title: What is the interpretation of a single man’s dream that he is pregnant with Ibn Sirin?  Dream interpretation of pregnancy with a boy for a single woman, dream interpretation of pregnancy with a girl for a single woman and dream interpretation of pregnancy and marriage for a single woman

preview.html: A single girl dreams that she is pregnant. One of the strange dreams that many unmarried girls see, and which causes them a lot of anxiety, is also the subject of controversy among scholars. Is it a vision of good or a vision of evil? This is what we will present in the next article. A single girl dreams that she is pregnant with her son, Shereen. What is the interpretation of a single man’s dream that he is pregnant? Scientists differed in interpreting a single man’s dream that he is pregnant. Some of them interpreted it as a promising vision for a girl of goodness and happiness, and some of them saw it as a bad omen and a sign of sadness and grief. Pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she bears many difficult responsibilities and endures difficulties in real life, and some scholars, led by Al-Nabulsi, believe that the pregnancy of an unmarried girl It leads to great distress that afflicts the family. This is due to the girl, so she must be careful not to get into trouble and fear God to avoid temptations. While some scholars, such as Ibn Shaheen, believe that the pregnancy of an unmarried woman is one of the good visions that carry with it abundant good news of goodness and contentment, and the larger the size of the abdomen, the greater the size. Its size and largest. Expected good. And God knows best. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the interpretation of an individual pregnancy in a dream depends on the condition of the girl herself in the dream. If she is happy, this is good news for the girl that she will receive in the coming period. If she is unhappy in the dream, this means that she will marry a person with whom she will suffer because of his bad morals. A single girl dreams that she is pregnant with her son Shirin. A dream of being liberated in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is one of the favorite and promising visions, and it also symbolizes the goodness of the situation and the girl’s attachment to her religion and morals. The good news. An unmarried woman seeing that she is pregnant in her dream means that good things will come to her in the coming period and that she is about to receive happy news that will change her life positively. This will bring her a lot of sustenance and bring her a lot of good. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy and childbirth for a single woman. Some scholars interpreted the pregnancy of an unmarried woman in a dream as good news and blessings that will pervade the dreamer’s life. In the coming period, while others interpreted it as a harbinger of anxiety and fears that will soon befall the girl. Details of the dream. Whatever the interpretation, childbirth in a woman’s dream is comfort, relief, relief from anxiety, and relief from distress. The easier the birth, the greater and faster the relief. However, if an unmarried woman sees that she is giving birth without seeing the pregnancy, then it is fortunate that she will achieve what she desires without suffering, and that she will soon hear news that will please her mind. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy with a boy for a single woman: Pregnancy with a boy for an unmarried woman is an undesirable vision, as it is a symbol of unhappiness and suffering and it also shows that The girl is in a state of stress and tension because she is waiting for news or a decision that affects her life. It arrives in separation. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy with a girl for a single woman. Unlike pregnancy with a boy, the pregnancy of a girl for unmarried people is considered one of the most promising visions.

title: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing a policeman or officer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an officer in a dream and the importance of his presence. The presence of an officer is one of the necessary things in every society, as the police and the presence of officers are the people authorized to control security in various parts of the country and protect lives and public property from theft, looting, or deliberate sabotage, as well as eliminating extremist groups and outlaws. Through an Egyptian website, we present to you an explanation of the most important symbols related to seeing an officer in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a policeman in a dream? The presence of a policeman in a dream or seeing a policeman in a dream is considered an indicator of the presence of many symbols associated with it, as follows: Ibn Shaheen said If a policeman appears in your dream, this is a message that carries good news for you that you will get rid of the feeling of fear that dominates your life, whether this feeling results from the harm that you expect from an enemy. Or fears of upcoming dangers that may be related to work, for example. Also, seeing a police officer in your home is one of the symbols that indicate the stability of your home life or the collapse of any family disputes that you may be experiencing now. What is the interpretation of seeing police officers in a dream? To see that you You are walking on your way and there is a policeman standing next to you on your way or blocking your way. This means that you can achieve your goal and achieve it and that your serious pursuit at that time will lead you to your desired dream. But if you see in your dream that the police are following you and chasing you, this reflects the voice of your conscience warning you not to stray from the path you are taking. And watch your steps because you are committing sins and transgressions. Seeing in your dream that you are meeting many officers, this portends a promotion at work, a safe and stable life, and more well-being in your life. What is the interpretation of seeing a military man in a dream? The interpretation of seeing an army officer in a dream is one of the symbols that heralds a feeling of security. And stability in various aspects of your life. This means that you see an army officer or a soldier in your dream. This indicates the stability of the country’s conditions and the stability of the economic conditions in it, especially if there is an increase in prices or an economic or financial crisis going through the current period. What is the interpretation of seeing an officer in a dream by Ibn Sirin? To see an officer in your dream means comfort in the matters that exhausted and exhausted you in the past. The previous period and that in the next period of your life you will be able to change it in a very positive way to achieve your goal. Seeing yourself as if the police entered your house expresses a lot of goodness that is permeating your life and freeing you from serious stress that could be debts and serious financial problems. And also, if You saw in your dream that the policemen are calling you by your name, so there is no need to be afraid of this dream because it is also one of the symbols that bring goodness to your ability to achieve and reach your goal. Or the desire that you want so badly will soon come true for you. Ibn Sirin also confirmed that the policemen running after you are warning you of the necessity of reviewing your relationship with God Almighty and increasing your obedience and supplication. But if you constantly feel as if you are running and chasing the police, meaning that you are repeating the vision of the police chasing and chasing you, then this I mean, no

What is the interpretation of seeing an officer in a dream by Ibn Sirin? To see an officer in your dream means comfort in the matters that exhausted and exhausted you in the past. The previous period and that in the next period of your life you will be able to change it in a very positive way to achieve your goal. Seeing yourself as if the police entered your house expresses a lot of goodness that is permeating your life and freeing you from serious stress that could be debts and serious financial problems. And also, if You saw in your dream that the policemen are calling you by your name, so there is no need to be afraid of this dream because it is also one of the symbols that bring goodness to your ability to achieve and reach your goal. Or the desire that you want so badly will soon come true for you. Ibn Sirin also confirmed that the policemen running after you are warning you of the necessity of reviewing your relationship with God Almighty and increasing your obedience and supplication.
